title: 09/02/2021 - HOUR 1 - Raiders, Zach Wilson, Packers, Michigan
itunes:title: 09/02/2021 - HOUR 1 - Raiders, Zach Wilson, Packers, Michigan
description:
The Raiders are not a playoff team

Tony Romo is overhyping Jets QB Zach Wilson

The Packers will be interesting to watch this season

Can HC Jim Harbaugh turn around Michigan this season?


Guest: Peter King

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
